statements: UPDATE ad_performance_metrics SET ad_name='New Ad', clicks=100, impressions=500, conversion_rate=0.05 WHERE ad_id=1;
UPDATE ad_performance_metrics SET impressions=300, conversion_rate=0.1, clicks=50, ad_name='Updated Ad' WHERE ad_id=2;
UPDATE ad_performance_metrics SET conversion_rate=0.05, clicks=100 WHERE ad_id=100
UPDATE ad_performance_metrics SET impressions=500, conversion_rate=0.1 WHERE clicks > 50
UPDATE ad_performance_metrics SET clicks = 50, conversions = 10 WHERE ad_id = 123;
UPDATE ad_adjustments SET adjustment_amount = 1000.50, adjustment_type = 'Budget Increase' WHERE adjustment_id = 456;
UPDATE ad_performance_metrics SET clicks = 100, conversions = 20 WHERE ad_id = 1;
UPDATE ad_adjustments SET adjustment_amount = 500.75, adjustment_type = 'Increase' WHERE ad_id = 2;
UPDATE real_time_ad_performance_metrics SET conversions = 20 WHERE ad_id = 123;
UPDATE ad_click_history SET device_type = 'Mobile' WHERE click_id = 456;
UPDATE real_time_ad_performance_metrics SET clicks = clicks + 1, conversions = conversions + 2 WHERE ad_id = 101;
UPDATE ad_click_history SET device_type = 'Mobile' WHERE click_id = 501;
UPDATE ad_campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE ad_performance SET clicks = 150, conversion_rate = 0.12 WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE ad_campaigns SET campaign_name = 'New Campaign Name', start_date = '2022-09-01' WHERE campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE ad_performance SET impressions = 5000, clicks = 200, conversion_rate = 0.05 WHERE metric_id = 201;
UPDATE ads SET ad_name='New Product Ad', ad_type='Product' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE campaigns SET end_date='2022-12-31', start_date='2022-01-01' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE ads SET ad_type='New Type', impressions=1000 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE campaigns SET end_date='2022-12-31', start_date='2021-01-01' WHERE id=5;
